headline: Introducing thresholds in Security Event Alerting: a z-score love story
keywords: Notifications, Alerts, WAF, Product News, Security, Internship Experience
description: Today we are excited to announce thresholds for our Security Event Alerts: a new and improved way of detecting anomalous spikes of security events on your Internet properties. By introducing a threshold, we are able to make alerts more accurate and only notify you when it truly matters
